NF.Q: Between which pairs of nodes in column Distribution Center and column Factory is the flow between 167 and 174? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.

NF.Q: In the sankey chart, which links have a flow between 127 and 167? Please list the source node, target node, and their corresponding flow values.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Component Assembly to node Outlet Mall and from node Chemical Plant to node Packaging Line, which path has a larger flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Chemical Plant} to node {Packaging Line} is larger.

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Electronics Plant to node Component Assembly, from node Chemical Plant to node Component Assembly, and from node Food Processing Plant to node Labeling, which path has the largest flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Chemical Plant} to node {Component Assembly} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which node in the column Distribution Center of the sankey chart is the most critical?

MSR.Q: What is the path with the highest total flow from source node North Hub to target node Outlet Mall? Please list all node labels along this path.
MSR.A: The path with the highest total flow from node North Hub to node Outlet Mall is: {North Hub, Chemical Plant, Component Assembly, Outlet Mall}.
